thread.title: ‘Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant’ Tests Breakfast Offerings
thread.title_full: ‘Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant’ Tests Breakfast Offerings

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: ‘Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant’ Tests Breakfast Offerings
text:
Request a Quote ‘Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant’ Tests Breakfast Offerings 
Beginning November 1st, Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant inside Disney’s Hollywood Studios® will begin testing breakfast service at their location. Guests can kick their “solar day” off right by enjoying an out-of-this-world breakfast in one of the park’s most popular dining locations. 
Breakfast service will include breakfast pastries to share in addition to a choice of appetizer, entrée and non-alcoholic beverage. The complete menu is not yet available, but here is a preview of some of the offerings: 
Appetizers 
Entrées Puff Pastry filled with Scrambled Eggs, Crab, Asparagus and Gruyère Cheese with Roasted Tomatoes Grilled Beef Tenderloin on Baby Spinach, with Bacon and Cheddar Custard on a Roasted Tomato and Cheesy Horseradish potatoes Scrambled Eggs, Crispy Bacon, Sausage Links and Breakfast Potatoes Macadamia Crusted Brioche French Toast with Mascarpone and Fresh Berries Mickey Waffle with side of Bacon or Sausage Kids Offerings: Scrambled Eggs with Sausage, Bacon and Potatoes French toast or a mini-Mickey waffle 
Menu offerings subject to change. 
The Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant breakfast is available for a limited time – from Nov. 1, 2015 until Jan. 23, 2016. Pricing is $23.99 +tax for adults and $12.99 +tax for kids ages 3 to 9 or (1) Table Service entitlement on the Disney Dining Plans. Contact your Magic Maker® with additional questions or to request your Advance Dining Reservation!
